articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: OpenAI reverses course, says its nonprofit will remain in control of its business operations - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI has decided that its nonprofit division will retain control over its for-profit org, after the company initially announced that it planned to convert to a for-profit organization.
articles.content:
OpenAI has decided that its nonprofit division will retain control over its for-profit organization, after the company initially announced that it planned to convert to a for-profit organization.
